comment: A little chocolate comes through, but mostly rye, rye, and more rye
Chocolatey, not a fan of that flavor
Weird, really weird. Tastes like horse food, but in a way that is more fascinating than off putting.

there's no spice like normal ryes
has an oxidized chocolate flavor

Nose: Rye, Grass, Leather, Pepper

Taste: Heavy Rye Spice, Leather, Grass, Dirt, Pepper, Slight Chocolate
Too young and very rough. Needs lots of TLC and aging
Interesting nose. Big chocolate coffee in finish
I was going to keep it just for others to taste, reminds me of paint thinner.   I didn't give one star because it was NOT harsh alcohol, was drinkable, just not for me.
not bad for a young rye. surprisingly chocolatey. while not my favorite sipping rye, this makes a tremendous cocktail, where i prefer a punchier, more grain-forward whiskey...
